snippet: JACOBS--Robert F. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of Wormser, Kiely, Galef & Jacobs LLP extend our deepest condolences to the family of Robert F. Jacobs on his passing on February 27. Bob's intellect, courage, loyalty, leadership and good cheer were a guiding light for all of us to follow and we will always remember all that Bob contributed to the ongoing success of our firm. We mourn his loss but are proud to say he was our most respected colleague and friend. He will be sorely missed by all of us. To Bonnie, Marc, Jodi and the rest of Bob's family, we express our hopes and prayers at this most difficult time. 1/3
lead_paragraph: JACOBS--Robert F. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of Wormser, Kiely, Galef & Jacobs LLP extend our deepest condolences to the family of Robert F. Jacobs on his passing on February 27. Bob's intellect, courage, loyalty, leadership and good cheer were a guiding light for all of us to follow and we will always remember all that Bob contributed to the ongoing success of our firm. We mourn his loss but are proud to say he was our most respected colleague and friend. He will be sorely missed by all of us. To Bonnie, Marc, Jodi and the rest of Bob's family, we express our hopes and prayers at this most difficult time. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  JACOBS, ROBERT F
